discourse_list.title: Notes from Data Session in Berlin

content.content: These are my notes from the session I and Ben Bollen held on the second day of the council.  I’d be very happy to get any corrections/additions/clarifications, etc.   docs.google.com    Magicians Discussion - Blockchain/Account Scrapers and Data Accessibility Nominal Topic: Improving the node to promote running more nodes / Preparing for Sharding  Actual Discussion Topic: Is there a “data problem”? Is there a danger of Ethereum data access becoming centralized?  ---- The following notes follow Chatham...
